It's a finely crafted piece of writing and an extraordinarily well-realized production...A warm, funny and poignant set of overlapping and interwoven tales that combine into a bountiful tapestry...Mendes creates an almost cinematic realism here, despite a few supernatural elements...This production is extraordinary â€” don't miss it."
